name: CLOSURE (itch) (LadyLuck)
description:
CLOSURE is a minimalistic arcade experience based on Pong where you have to keep a virtual ball from escaping off-screen.  The mouse position  on the screen controls the four pads. Survive for 10 minutes.

It is a hardcore challenge and there is no "hi-scores" or "best time". You either can do it or you can't.
